Trade/Device Name(s): FreeStyle Precision Neo Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): FreeStyle Precision Neo Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FreeStyle Precision Neo Blood Glucose Test Strips for quantitative glucose measurement using amperometric technology with compatible blood glucose meters
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test strip used with FreeStyle Libre Reader's built-in meter to quantitatively measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip; not for neonatal samples or diabetes diagnosis/screening; intended for single-person home management of diabetes
